document.docAuthor: Faleiro, Bárbara T. & Santos, Adalberto J.
document.masterDocTitle: Three new species and new records of the orb-weaving spider genus Philoponella (Araneae, Uloboridae) from Brazil and Ecuador

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Three new species and new records of the orb-weaving spider genus Philoponella (Araneae, Uloboridae) from Brazil and Ecuador

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution.
P. fasciata
has been known to occur in Brazil , Paraguay and Argentina (
Platnick 2013
,
Opell 1979
). Here, the distribution in Brazil is expanded (
Fig. 7 C
).

Material examined. Brazil , Bahia : Ilhéus (Reserva Zoobotânica, CEPLAC,
